item.title: Python
item.description: Generic features and syntax Decorators Metaclasses Set operations Modules Generic features and syntax class.__mro__ = Contains all the ancestors of the class, up till object, the Python base class _ = At Python prompt, it represents the last value. Mostly like $? in Bash __file__ = Contains the name of the file loaded (a module if importing or the filename of the script) locals() = Returns a dictionary with the local namespace globals() = Returns a dictionary with the global module namespace.
